text: Emajuddin Ahamed (15 December 1933 â€“ 17 July 2020) was a Bangladeshi political scientist, author and educator. He was the 21st vice-chancellor of the University of Dhaka during 1992 to 1996. He was awarded the Ekushey Padak in 1992. He was born in Malda district, Bengal Presidency. Ahamed died from a cerebral hemorrhage in Dhaka on 17 July 2020, aged 86. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bangladeshi writers Category:Academics of the University of Dhaka Category:Political scientists
title: Emajuddin Ahamed
